fields.name: ThrottleTimeMs
fields.about: The duration in milliseconds for which the request was throttled due to a quota violation, or zero if the request did not violate any quota.

fields.name: ErrorCode
fields.about: The top-level error code, or 0 if there was no error

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.about: The top-level error message, or null if there was no error.

fields.name: ActiveTasks
fields.about: Target active tasks for this consumer.

fields.name: StandbyTasks
fields.about: Target standby tasks for this consumer.

fields.name: WarmupTasks
fields.about: Target warming up tasks for this consumer.

fields.name: ProcessId
fields.about: Identity of the streams instance that may have multiple consumers.

fields.name: HostInfo
fields.about: Host information for running interactive queries on this instance.

fields.name: Host
fields.about: Host for running interactive queries on this instance.

fields.name: Port
fields.about: Port for running interactive queries on this instance.

fields.name: TaskOffsetUpdateReason
fields.about: Reason for updating task offset. 0 if no update, 1 if task catches up with acceptable.recovery.lag, 2 if task falls behind acceptable.recovery.lag, 3 if a standby task is added or removed, 4 if triggerd by a time-interval

fields.name: TaskOffset
fields.about: Cumulative offsets for assigned and dormant standby tasks. Only updatable when TaskOffsetUpdateReason is not zero. Null if unchanged since last heartbeat.

fields.name: Offset
fields.about: The cumulative offset for the task

fields.name: UserData
fields.about: Opaque user data to be passed to the client-side assignor. Null if unchanged since last heartbeat.

fields.name: AssignmentConfigs
fields.about: Generic array of assignment configuration strings.
